message.content:
1. Maximal mean LDL-C reductions from day -1 baseline occurred on day 71.
2. The group treated with alirocumab plus placebo had a 47.4% reduction in LDL-C.
3. The group treated with alirocumab plus ezetimibe had a 56.6% reduction in LDL-C.
4. The group treated with alirocumab plus fenofibrate had a 54.3% reduction in LDL-C.

messages.content:
Statement: Maximal mean LDL‐C reductions from day −1 baseline (prealirocumab) occurred on day 71 in all groups: alirocumab plus placebo, 47.4%; alirocumab plus ezetimibe, 56.6%; and alirocumab plus fenofibrate, 54.3%.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
